title: 1 BR - 700 sqft - Newly Remodeled Spacious Apartment Available Soon!
map_address: 4421 West 137th Street near Near County Road 42 and Glendale Rd
app_fee: $45 per adult for credit and background check
posting_body: ['This spacious ground floor 1 bedroom 1 bathroom Spruce floor plan is available soon!', 'This apartment is located in Savage MN at Hidden Valley Apartments owned by Bigos Management -', 'show contact info', 'Your new home features a newly remodeled spacious kitchen with GIANT walk-in pantry, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, granite countertops and open floor plan perfect for entertaining.', 'There is a lot of storage space as well as a patio to enjoy the quiet neighborhood.', 'Rent includes assigned parking spot and single stall garage!', 'Your new apartment community includes a 24 hr Fitness Center and package room, Seasonal Outdoor Pool, and Dog Run area.', 'We are a pet-friendly, no-smoking community.', 'Take a virtual walk-through on our website or schedule a tour today!', 'show contact info', '/ <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are both determined by requested move-in date, cannot be guaranteed due to on-site leasing activity, and are subject to change at any time.']
